name: LeadConvert

constructors.name: LeadConvert
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Database.LeadConvert class.

methods.name: getAccountId
methods.description: Gets the ID of the account into which the lead will be merged.

methods.name: getContactId
methods.description: Gets the ID of the contact into which the lead will be merged.

methods.name: getConvertedStatus
methods.description: Gets the lead status value for a converted lead.

methods.name: getLeadID
methods.description: Gets the ID of the lead to convert.

methods.name: getOpportunityName
methods.description: Gets the name of the opportunity to create.

methods.name: getOwnerID
methods.description: Gets the ID of the person to own any newly created account, contact, and opportunity.

methods.name: isDoNotCreateOpportunity
methods.description: Indicates whether an Opportunity is created during lead conversion (false, the default) or not (true).

methods.name: isOverWriteLeadSource
methods.description: Indicates whether the LeadSource field on the target Contact object is overwritten with the contents of the LeadSource field in the source Lead object (true), or not (false, the default).

methods.name: isSendNotificationEmail
methods.description: Indicates whether a notification email is sent to the owner specified by setOwnerId (true) or not (false, the default).

methods.name: setAccountId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the account into which the lead is merged. This value is required only when updating an existing account, including person accounts.

methods.name: setContactId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the contact into which the lead will be merged (this contact must be associated with the account specified with setAccountId, and setAccountId must be specified). This value is required only when updating an existing contact.

methods.name: setConvertedStatus
methods.description: Sets the lead status value for a converted lead. This field is required.

methods.name: setDoNotCreateOpportunity
methods.description: Specifies whether to create an opportunity during lead conversion. The default value is false: opportunities are created by default. Set this flag to true only if you do not want to create an opportunity from the lead.

methods.name: setLeadId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the lead to convert. This field is required.

methods.name: setOpportunityId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the opportunity into which the lead is merged. This value is required only when updating an existing opportunity.

methods.name: setOpportunityName
methods.description: Sets the name of the opportunity to create. If no name is specified, this value defaults to the company name of the lead.

methods.name: setOverwriteLeadSource
methods.description: Specifies whether to overwrite the LeadSource field on the target contact object with the contents of the LeadSource field in the source lead object. The default value is false, to not overwrite the field. If you specify this as true, you must also specify setContactId for the target contact.

methods.name: setOwnerId
methods.description: Specifies the ID of the person to own any newly created account, contact, and opportunity. If the application does not specify this value, the owner of the new object will be the owner of the lead.

methods.name: setSendNotificationEmail
methods.description: Specifies whether to send a notification email to the owner specified by setOwnerId. The default value is false, that is, to not send email.

description: Contains information used for lead conversion.
